item.title: Brett James, writer of ‘Jesus, Take The Wheel,’ dies in plane crash at 57
item.description: The small plane with three people aboard crashed “under unknown circumstances," the FAA said in a preliminary report.

item.title: It’s time for Intel to go private, former board members say
item.description: After taking rival Nvidia into its major shareholders, it's time for the government to arrange for Intel to go completely private.
